title: Chipotle Honey Glazed Pork
instructions: Purée chipotles in adobo with garlic and honey in a blender until it’s smooth.  Pat dry the pork loin with paper towels and season with salt.  Put the pork on a foil-lined baking sheet and spread with the chipotle glaze to coat well. Roast in the middle of the oven until an instant-read thermometer registers 155° F, about 20 minutes.
Let the pork loin rest on the cutting board before cutting for 5 minutes.  Slice thin and serve.
remarks: You may wish to reduce the number of chipotle chilies if you are concerned about how “spicy-hot” this dish is.
source: The Best of Gourmet 2000, from the Editors of Gourmet, ©1999 by The Condé Nast Publications, Published by Random House Inc., New York.
